speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Jessica from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but what's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit Card. This call is to discuss your account.

speaker: Customer
text: I've requested several times to stop calling me.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. I can help you with that. Would you like me to mark your number as do not call?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, please do that. I don't want any more calls.

speaker: Agent
text: Got it! I'll mark your number on the do not call list immediately.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Your request has been processed. Have a great day!
